channel.title: Robert Chisholm

item.title: Mentioned by Vancouver Sun
item.description:
NDP MP hopes cyberbullying bill will pass
New Democrat MP Robert Chisholm says he's hopeful the federal government will lend its support to his private member's bill or quickly put forward its own legislation to make the non-consensual distribution of sexually explicit images illegal. Introduced as ...

item.title: Mentioned by Canada.com
item.description:
NDP MP urges government to back cyberbullying bill
OTTAWA — New Democrat MP Robert Chisholm says he's hopeful the federal government will lend its support to his private member's bill or quickly put forward its own legislation to make the non-consensual distribution of sexually explicit images illegal.
